Content: The Maha Sangha has emphasized that all decisions and rulings of the country should be implemented under the sovereignty of the people. The Maha Sangha points out the Rulers should conduct a General Election and ensure the sovereignty of the people. The National Sangha Summit was held yesterday. The Summit was commenced at Nelum Pokuna Theater after the Maha Sangha arrived at the location from the Mahaweli Centre. It was emphasized during the summit the need to standup for the sovereignty of the people and to defeat the efforts to destroy Theravada Buddhism in a divided state.
